name.ja: リリーの<ruby>注<rt>ちゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>射<rt>しゃ</rt></ruby><ruby>器<rt>き</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: Your opponent has a monster on their field.

effect.en: Add 1 EARTH Attribute monster with 400 ATK/1500 DEF from your Graveyard to your hand. Then, this turn, if you would activate the effect of "Injection Fairy Lily", you can pay 100 LP to meet the requirement.
